messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Indigio Children? Beautiful post
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/12/04 01:42:46 AM Central Standard Time, Lmanathome@msn.com writes: Now aren t all children truly special, coming into the world knowing
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/12/04 01:42:46 AM Central Standard Time,
Lmanathome@... writes:
Now aren't all children truly special, coming into the world knowing who they
are. As a parent I believe it's been my job from the beginning to not get in
the way of my child being her self, to celebrate their exceptional qualities
in a loving and caring environment.

Lisa H.
########

I just thought this was beautiful.

~Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
